notes.text: switched out 2 chalices to 2 different dimension ground and workd like charm in ladder today, excellent against archfiends n sylvans as i met alot of em. lost 3x promo to bricks and 1 of them was me misplaying. i think restart might be a good choice if u r good at predicting the deck your opponent uses, wanna confuse ur opponent, and want different dimension ground on first turn . cant think of other deck that can utilize n maindecking this tech in this meta better than fishies. u can stay passive n not attacking possible facedown komushroomo til u get ur fish bullets set.
